name: Cloning
details: Replication of DNA in a foreign host

name: Expression
details: Production of a recombinant protein from a cloned gene

name: Mini prep
details: Small scale purification of plasmid DNA

name: Chromatography
details: Chromatographic separation techniques e.g. HPLC, TLC, Gel filtration

name: Refold
details: Enabling a denatured or unfolded protein to adopt its native conformation

name: Concentration
details: Reduce the volume of a solution

name: Fractionation
details: Separation of a mixture into its component parts

name: Protein production summary
details: Summary of expression and purification details

name: Drop scoring
details: User-defined score from a crystallization experiment

name: Mount crystal
details: Crystal mounting e.g. in a loop or capllary

name: Native diffraction
details: Obtain diffraction data for native protein crystal

name: Selmet diffraction
details: Obtain diffraction data for Seleneomethionine-labelled protein crystal

name: Culture
details: Growth of cells in liquid media

name: Import sample
details: Import of a reagent or sample into PiMS

name: Fermentation
details: Large scale culture under controlled conditions

name: Characterisation
details: Protein characterisation e.g. SDS-PAGE, DLS, CD, etc.

name: Gel
details: Gel Electrophoresis e.g. SDS-PAGE, agarose gel

name: Dish culture
details: Growth of cells on a solid support, e.g. agar plate

name: PDB
details: Record deposition of crystal coordinates in PDB

name: Plate check
details: Test of transformation by growth on solid support

name: Complexation
details: Mixing of protein samples to form a complex
